Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
GenAI was able to help with providing more information as to why it might believe that my assignment was good/bad based on the rubricks I provided it, and how to work on it.
The lecturers and tutors are more likely to not assist with providing any form of feedback other than at the end of the assignment when the results come out, as "if I do it for you, I have to do it for everyone else and that's not fair|"

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI is at least able to provide some form of feedback that could be useful to help improve my work, lecturers and tutors are more than likely not at all helpful as their hands are tied and may be worried about favouring one student over another or having to help all other students in their work.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: The former provides some that may or may not be useful, the other doesn't generally do it at all
